name: airdropjs
description: A simple airdrop like application, run the nodejs server and you can transfer files accross any device

scripts.gitUpdate: git add . && git commit -m "update nodejs-airdrop," && git push
scripts.dc_dev: npm run dc_gen_dev && docker compose -f ./docker-compose.gen.yml up -d
scripts.dc_gen_dev: docker compose -f docker-compose.yml -f docker-compose.dev.yml config > docker-compose.gen.yml
scripts.dc_restart: npm run dc_kill && npm run dc_down && docker compose -f ./docker-compose.gen.yml restart
